price: 26. Too waqdi kaa qideeniih, Yalli jannat cul kaak iyye, maganey yi- mari aaxaginnay!
arabic: قِيلَ ٱدۡخُلِ ٱلۡجَنَّةَۖ قَالَ يَٰلَيۡتَ قَوۡمِي يَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: qīla ud'khuli al-janata qāla yālayta qawmī yaʿlamūna
